title: Help what font?
content:
I am designing an ad and our client specifically want the the same font as the attached image. There should be 2 fonts. Please help. Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131957im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_6106.jpg)

 [‹ (x) 40 font list ID - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131957/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47435 "Go to previous forum topic") [Suite Française cover: skinny WPA-ish lettering (like a dieting Futura Display) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821131957/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48188 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gncreation

comments.content: The, of and Carmel are Goudy Old Style.

Thank you to you both  
Marcox and Bowfinpw!
“The” and “of Carmel” look more like a manipulated Adobe Garamond (or some Garamond) to me. The top of the Goudy T is completely flat and it has a different stress in the curve of the C and R.
I stand corrected, Minimalista. That is indeed Adobe Garamond.
